attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that any government minister or other publicly funded official who is found to be employing illegal immigrants in any aspect of the activity of his or her department or area of responsibility are PERSONALLY responsible for paying any fines imposed as a result of being caught out as an employer of illegal immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayer has, for too long, been a sap for the illegal activities of thousands of political appointees and publicly funded employees where fines have been imposed as punishment for those activities.  It has to stop!  If a government minister or local council official wants to employ illegal immigrants then he or she must pay the fine, personally, when they get caught out.
